remarks:
A mixed syllogism inference from a nested implication and a biconditional.  Useful for substituting an embedded antecedent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-1993.) 

---

 A mixed syllogism inference from a nested implication and a biconditional.  Useful for substituting an embedded antecedent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
syl5bi.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
syl5bi.2 $e |- ( ch -> ( ps -> th ) ) $.
syl5bi $p |- ( ch -> ( ph -> th ) ) $.
